name: Admin Console Release 24.1
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a new feature and a few bug fixes, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

ADDED.text: New Data Migration feature under the Deployment section, allowing you to perform limited self-service data migrations. Refer to the Data Migration document for more details.

FIXED.text: All the Custom fields (Active/Inactive) are visible in the Admin Console under the Customer Management section.
Uploading a file with the same name will reflect the changes on the IDX page now.
